title: Effective treatment of 2,4,6-trinitrotoluene from aqueous media using a sono–photo-Fenton-like process with a zero-valent iron nanoparticle (nZVI) catalyst
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23720-23729
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03907F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hoang Van Nguyen, Son Tung Pham, Toan Ngoc Vu, Huong Van Nguyen, Duong Duc La
This work provides an effective approach to remove 2,4,6-trinitrotoluene from aqueous media using a sono–photo-Fenton-like process with catalytic zero-valent iron nanoparticles (nZVI).
